attributes.action: Bring in legislation requiring all MPs. to produce valid receipts for all expenses claimed as part of their duties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most occupations require employees to produce valid receipts for all expenses claims incurred as a result of carrying out their duties. MP.s should lead by example and produce such receipts to avoid any suspicion of committing the Criminal offence of Obtaining Money by deception.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
